topic.title: Windows Help/RTF – Table columns not in reverse order

keywords.indexterm: bidirectional languagesWindows Help and RTFlimitationsright-to-left tables

body.p: Although the RTF specification encloses special tags for bidirectional language processing of tables, the Microsoft Help compiler does not support column reordering for bidirectional languages. Note the following excerpt from a Microsoft technical article: … Right-to-left tables, a standard feature of word processors such as Arabic Microsoft Word, are not a supported feature of Help Compiler Workshop. Help Compiler Workshop will compile a right-to-left table as if it is a left-to-right table. ….
As a workaround, you can edit the tables manually before importing the documents into . You can use the Word macro function to automate this task.
